🧮 Advanced Problem 2

“Try to solve it using only elementary school knowledge!”

(1) You go shopping and first spend 800 yen. Then, you spend 30% of the remaining money. After that, you’re left with 1/6 of the original amount.

Question: How much money did you have at the beginning?

(2) Hanako received some New Year gift money.

She spent 1/2 of it on a reference book. The next day, she spent 2/5 of the remaining half on a CD. After that, she bought clothing for 1,700 yen. At the end, she had 1/10 of the original money left.

Question: How much money did she originally receive? —

📝 Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
